title: China’s tech decoupling with the US is trouble. It’s one of their ‘top 10 risks in 2022’ - ThePrint
content: China’s tech decoupling with the US is trouble. It’s one of their ‘top 10 risks in 2022’  ThePrint
description: As the US-China tech war rages on, China is dealing with uncovering of its ‘centres for political thought’.
